QuestData.Title: Arms of the Grimtotems
QuestData.Description: If the equipment you found at the ruins of the inn belonged to a Grimtotem attack party, there's likely to be more just like it within their camp to the northwest.$B$BWe haven't been able to gather much information about Blackhoof Village, but judging from the size of the raiding parties, there's a substantial force based there.$B$BDo whatever you have to to capture some of their equipment so that we can compare it with your findings from the inn.
QuestData.LogDescription: Captain Darill at North Point Tower wants you to bring him 7 Blackhoof Armaments.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you get those weapons from Blackhoof Village?
QuestData.RewardText: <Captain Darill inspects the armaments you've brought from Blackhoof Village.>$B$BThere's no doubt about it. These match the description exactly, but there's just one problem -- these have never been used in battle. Blackhoof Village must not be the only Grimtotem post in the marsh.
